sentence.Network_en: In some respects the African mind works rather differently from the occidental one.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某些方面，非洲人的思维方式与西方人相差甚远。

sentence.Network_en: My dense Occidental mind did not immediately follow his meaning.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这个不机灵的西方脑袋瓜未能立即体会他的意思.

sentence.Network_en: A sort of halo, an occidental glow, came over life then.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时候,就有一种祥光, 一片晚霞, 在生活上,笼罩缭绕.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin occidentalis, from occident- 'going down' (see Occident)

entry.tran: 西方的；西方国家的；欧美的
entry.def: Occidental means relating to the countries of Europe and America.

example.ex: In some respects the African mind works rather differently from the occidental one.
example.tran: 在某些方面，非洲人的思维方式与西方人相差甚远。

means.word_mean: 1. denoting or characteristic of countries of Europe and the Western Hemisphere;
